definition: surname Jin/the Jin Dynasties (265-420)/Western Jin 西晉|西晋[Xi1 Jin4] (265-316), Eastern Jin 東晉|东晋[Dong1 Jin4] (317-420) and Later Jin Dynasty (936-946)/short name for Shanxi province 山西[Shan1 xi1]

sentences.english: Frankfurterin:Do you think that Eintracht will be promoted this season?
sentences.chinese: 你认为法兰克福这个赛季会晋级吗？

sentences.english: Winning his heat in a comfortable 14.02 seconds in front of 3500 people at Tseung Kwan O Sports Ground, Liu Xiang finally strode home with 13.66 seconds for the title.
sentences.chinese: 而在此前的预赛中，刘翔以14秒02轻松晋级。

sentences.english: Most people would think that we have a good chance. I think we do.
sentences.chinese: 大多数人都认我们有很大的几率晋级，我也这么认为。

sentences.english: The Saudis only need a draw from their final match against Bahrain in Palembang to progress.
sentences.chinese: 沙特只要在小组赛最后一轮与巴林打平便可晋级。

sentences.english: They're away at Anfield in the first leg and that's a big factor.
sentences.chinese: 他们享有先客后主的优势，这是他们晋级的最大砝码。

sentences.english: Sarah Palin says she'll go to the Super Bowl if actual bears are playing in it.
sentences.chinese: 佩林说如果熊晋级超级碗的话她就亲自去看。

sentences.english: This year's winner in Vegas , Jerry Yang, qualified the same way.
sentences.chinese: 今年的维加斯扑克冠军杰瑞杨的晋级之路也是如此。

sentences.english: Uruguay and Mexico both reached the second stage。
sentences.chinese: 乌拉圭和墨西哥队同时晋级下一轮比赛。

sentences.english: The follow-on to the Xia class is the Type-094 Jin class SSBN.
sentences.chinese: 在夏级之后的潜艇是094晋级核潜艇。

sentences.english: All candidates have their competition experience (EV) of the previous cycle credited.
sentences.chinese: 所有晋级者都有上一个周期比赛经历的记录。

sentences.english: Even if they progress, this display did not stir optimism.
sentences.chinese: 不过即使他们能够晋级，这样的表现也无法让人乐观。

sentences.english: And Lech Poznan did well in their group to qualify ahead of Juventus.
sentences.chinese: 莱克普斯纳也不错，在小组里力压尤文图斯而晋级。

sentences.english: He had barely survived the audition and finally got a chance to advance in the contest.
sentences.chinese: 海选中，他险遭淘汰，但最终赢得晋级的机会。

sentences.english: All his hopes centred on his promotion.
sentences.chinese: 他的全部希望寄托在他的晋级上。

sentences.english: I really hope they go all the way.
sentences.chinese: 我真心希望他们能够一路晋级。

sentences.english: He had barely survived the third audition and finally got a chance to advance in the contest.
sentences.chinese: 第三次海选时，他险遭淘汰，但最终赢得晋级的机会。

definition: (sports) to go out of bounds/to go over the line/to qualify for the next round of competition/(Tw) (fig.) to make the grade/to achieve success
to score a victory/to prevail over one's opponents
an upset (esp. in sports)/unexpected turn of events/to pull off a coup/a breakthrough
to suffer a defeat/to fail/to fall behind
to compete/to take part in a competition
(sports) semifinal or quarterfinal/to compete in a semifinal (or a quarterfinal)
